end

;show_date_as_turns

pirate_spawn_value 80

	faction_creator apachean

	{
		type hunters_tent hunters_tipi
	}

		type farmers_tent farmers_tipi
	}
}

faction_relationships 	aztecs, at_war_with 	slave, tlaxcalans
faction_relationships 	tlaxcalans, at_war_with 	slave, aztecs
faction_relationships 	mayans, at_war_with 	slave

faction_relationships 	chichimeca, at_war_with 	slave
faction_relationships 	apachean, at_war_with 	slave
